description: Some people like to make their Bloody Mary with vodka, some with&nbsp;tequila, and others prefer gin. But what about the beer? This recipe takes a lot of classic aspects of the&nbsp;Bloody Mary and throws in an exciting twist that is sure to please even the pickiest drinkers.This cocktail is also called “Red Beer,” which highlights the classic taste of a wheat beer alongside the savory hints from the rest of the ingredients.
name: Beer Bloody Mary

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, prepared horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, celery salt in a cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, prepared horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, celery salt in a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well to combine, then strain into a glass of choice.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well to combine, then strain into a glass of choice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with pale lager. Garnish with celery stalk and serve immediately.
